required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study Evaluating Management of Patients With Moderate and Severe Psoriasis
clinical_study.official_title: Management of Patients With Moderate and Severe Psoriasis Under Treatment With Topical and/or Systemic Drugs

lead_sponsor.agency: Wyeth is now a wholly owned subsidiary of Pfizer

clinical_study.source: Wyeth is now a wholly owned subsidiary of Pfizer

brief_summary.textblock: This is an observational, naturalistic, multicenter, retrospective study to describe the therapeutic management of patients with moderate and severe psoriasis under treatment with topical and/or systemic drugs in usual clinical practice in Spain.

primary_outcome.measure: Descriptive analysis of the therapeutic management of patients with moderate and severe psoriasis under treatment with topical and/or systemic drugs including sequence, doses and duration of treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Comparison of therapeutic management depending on patients' disease severity, using absolute and relative frequencies for qualitative variables and centralization and dispersion measures (mean, SD, median, minimum, maximum..) for quantitative variables.

arm_group.description: Patients with moderate and severe psoriasis under treatment with topical and/or systemic drugs

study_pop.textblock: Patients with moderate and severe psoriasis under treatment with topical and/or systemic drugs in usual clinical practice

criteria.textblock:
Main Inclusion Criteria:
·Over 18 years of age.·Diagnosed with moderate or severe psoriasis.·Initiated treatment with topical and/or systemic treatment between two and five years before enrollment in the study. ·Has a clinical record at the dermatologist office.
Main Exclusion Criteria:
·Currently participating in a clinical study. ·Clinical record lacks minimum data required for observational analysis.

overall_official.affiliation: Wyeth is now a wholly owned subsidiary of Pfizer
